title: MEGAPOLIS BY Kumar PROPERTIES AND ABIL GROUP
detail: Kumar and ABIL Megapolis harmonizes modern luxury with expansive living in Pune. This thoughtfully designed community offers a range of 2 BHK homes, each crafted to provide ample space and sophisticated comfort. Enjoy high-end features such as state-of-the-art modular kitchens, energy-efficient appliances, and elegant glass partitions. With beautifully landscaped gardens, private balconies, and exclusive amenities including a fully equipped clubhouse and rooftop leisure spaces, Kumar and ABIL Megapolis sets a new standard in contemporary living where style meets functionality.
developer_detail:
Well-established name in Pune's real estate since 1966, Kumar Properties is a major player known for successful residential and commercial ventures, notably IT parks. Their extensive experience contributes to annual sales exceeding 1 million. Flagship projects like Pricetown Towers and Park Infinia showcase their expertise.
Well-established name in Pune's real estate since 1966, Kumar Properties is a major player known for successful residential and commercial ventures, notably IT parks. Their extensive experience contributes to annual sales exceeding 1 million. Flagship projects like Pricetown Towers and Park Infinia showcase their expertise.

ABIL Group, an affiliate of Kumar Properties, strategically expands into residential, corporate, and hospitality sectors, with notable projects like Avaanti Residences and Castel Royal Grande.

city_description: Experience the pulse of Pune's IT hub in Hinjawadi Phase 3, a rapidly growing residential and commercial destination. Renowned for its proximity to major tech parks, this vibrant locale offers a plethora of opportunities for modern living. Explore a wide range of residential options, from contemporary apartments to spacious villas, catering to diverse needs and budgets. Enjoy seamless connectivity to Pune's major hubs via well-developed road networks and upcoming metro lines.
